entry.title: How to Run the Powerful Flux AI Image Generator on Less Powerful PCs
entry.summary: Flux, the open-source image generator launched last week, required huge amounts of computational power to run. The community has pared it down so you can run it, too. Here's how.

entry.summary: The SEC’s move to regulate DEXs would make it functionally impossible for DeFi projects to exist in the United States, Coinbase wrote Monday.

entry.title: Gigachad: A Crypto Coin With An Alpha Male Mindset
entry.summary: Gigachad is a meme coin centered around a meme that originates from 2017 after a photographer posted a bodybuilder with an unrealistically insane body. He was later named ‘Gigachad’ by 4Chan users.

entry.title: Binance Will Start Converting Monero to USDC on September 2 as Part of Delisting
entry.summary: The conversion will be based on the average exchange rate between Sept. 2, 2024 and Mar. 1, 2025. The funds won't be available until March.

entry.title: Bitcoin Recovers From Dip Below $58,000 as Institutional Buying Slows Down
entry.summary: Crypto investment products saw $176 million in inflows last week as institutions bought the dip, but that has slowed, according to Coinshares.

entry.summary: Political wagers on Polymarket hinge on whether Donald Trump will be in prison—or somehow wind up as president well ahead of the election.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Bitcoin Battered as Trump-Themed Tokens Dump
entry.summary: After a calamitous start, the crypto market weathered a wild week, with multiple Trump meme coin controversies in the mix.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 176 - ETH LEADS THE CHARGE
entry.summary: ETH leads gains in majors, ETHE outflows slowing. Putin signs crypto mining bill. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. Tether plans to double staff to improve compliance. Turkey sees surge in exchange applications. SEC plans to appeal XRP ruling. Franklin Templeton launches fund on ARB. SUI leads altcoins after Grayscale fund announced. TIA rises 20%, will launch mainnet in September. STX will launch final Nakamoto Code this month. Coinbase questions CFTC prediction market rules.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 175 - THE FTX SAGA CONTINUES
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$45m, ETH ETFs: -$24m. XRP settles with SEC for $125m, rises 20%. FTX ordered to repay $12.7bn. BTC Mayer Multiple hits lowest since FTX. Saylor personally owns over $1bn BTC. Dems launch ‘Crypto for Harris’ group. Brazil approves first spot SOL ETF. Robinhood crypto revenue up 161%. Ethena launches stablecoin on SOL. Jump likely shut ‘development arm’, not trading. Nomad bridge hacker moves $35m to Tornado. Metaplanet to buy $6.8m more BTC. Binance to list TON for spot. Binance invests in SOL restaking protocol. Arbitrum Orbit chains to use USDC for gas.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 174 - SOL BOUNCES 40%
entry.summary: SOL continues to lead majors, memecoins run higher. SOL/ETH hits ATH, breaks key resistance level. BTC whales bought $23bn in last month. BTC volatility hits 20-month high. NASDAQ & BlackRock ask to list ETH options. ETH ETF inflows outpace BTC. BlackRock ETH ETF sees $900m inflows so far. New ETH L2 created ‘every 19 days’. $2bn of seized ETH transferred by Chinese police. Jump continues to exit ETH position. Move in Yen is opportunity to buy BTC: Hayes. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. DeFi revenues soar, AAVE makes $6m in one day. HyperLiquid sees record $4.3bn of trade volume. Binance saw $1.2bn inflows, biggest inflow of 2024. Nearly every Binance launchpad coin is now red. Kamala reschedules crypto leaders meetup.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 173 - ARE WE BACK?
entry.summary: BTC & ETH ETFs see huge $6bn of trading volume. ‘Real number’ of liquidations estimated at $7-9bn. 274k traders liquidated on move. 60% of top 50 coins now red for 2024. Trump says US should not sell crypto holdings. Bitcoin not as good a hedge as gold: Cramer. Ark buys $18m Coinbase stock in drop. Capula reports $460m BTC ETF holding. Moonpay has highest volume day since April. Ronin bridge saved in 4000ETH white-hat hack. Bitcoin is pretend internet money: Tezos founder.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 172 - A VERY RED DAY FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits $50k, liquidations hit $1bn in sell-off. Macro sell-off and end of Yen carry trade blamed. Multiple altcoins hit cycle or all-time lows. Bitcoin dominance rises to cycle-high of 58%. Robinhood halts 24hr trading. Crypto funds saw $528m outflow last week. Justin Sun denies liquidation rumours. Jump Trading continues to liquidate holdings. Ethena founder confirms protocol has ‘zero issues’. Binance launches native KAS mining. Cycle hasn’t even started yet: Cobie.

entry.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION
entry.summary: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they’d launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 171 - The Bitcoin Bounce
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%. Coinbase shares rise 2% after strong earnings. Marathon Digital falls 8% after revenue miss. Bybit exits France over regulation. Crypto(.)com surpasses Coinbase volume. Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea. CVG falls 99% after exploit. JUP votes to reduce 30% team supply.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 170 - BITCOIN FALLS BELOW 65K
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +0m, ETH ETFs: -$77m. Crypto falls after Fed, Trump speech & Iran threats. Mt. Gox still has $2.1bn BTC after distributions. Lummis introduces bill to buy 1m BTC. Large BTC holders bought $5.4bn in July. Tether makes $1.3bn profit in Q2. DeFi loans hit 2022 levels. Base sees 80% of active Uniswap traders. $900m of altcoin unlocks this month. Elixir launches deUSD as rival to Ethena.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 169 - NEIRO HITS $100M!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$18m, ETH ETFs: +$34m. Mt. Gox move another $3bn BTC, prices stable. ETH ETFs see net inflow as Grayscale outflow slows. BTC exchange reserves hit multi-year low. XRP up 7% ahead of potential SEC settlement. UAE banks integrate crypto trading. Bybit integrates USDe with up to 20% yield. California DMV puts 42m car titles on AVAX. BTC mining to be a $20bn industry: Bernstein. Russia legalises various crypto activities. Terra blockchain halted, Astro faces $6.8m exploit. Trump raised $21m at BTC conference.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 168 - SEC DROPS SOL CLAIMS
entry.summary: BTC falls to $66k after government moves $2bn BTC. Transfer most likely just a new custodian. SEC plans to drop charges SOL is a security. SOL ETF not happening in near term: BlackRock. ETFs to hit model portfolios later this year: BlackRock. Grayscale ETH ETF outflows slow marginally. Tron surpasses ETH & SOL for 24hr revenue. Pump(.)fun revenue beats ETH. BTC future tied to the elections: Jeffries. Polymarket hits $1bn betting volume. Polymarket integrates with Substack. Binance Labs announce 7th season of incubations. There is merit to Bitcoin and other coins: Elon. DeFi coins rise as MKR votes to share fees. COMP agrees to share fees with token holders.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 167 - CHATTING TO DOODLES!
entry.summary: BTC nears $70k after Trump speech, PoW alts soar. Crypto funds saw $245m inflows last week. Open Interest on BTC hits record $39.4bn. SOL overtakes ETH in several key metrics. Pump(.)fun overtakes ETH for daily revenue. Jito overtakes Lido for fees collected. $1.5bn altcoin unlocks in August, $600m XRP. Compound DAO faces $25m governance attack. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week.

entry.title: New Technology Is Making Bionic Limbs More Affordable
entry.summary: Alt Bionics founder and CEO Ryan Saavedra talks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about the Genesis Hand, an affordable $5,000 bionic limb designed for daily use.

entry.title: The Story of Solana Meme Coin Billy
entry.summary: Billy is the largest Solana meme coin on Pumpdotfun, peaking at a market cap of over $200 million. But it wasn’t always smooth sailing. Minutes after launching Billy’s dev abandoned him and sold the majority of their tokens. At the time, the tokens were worth $1,116 but at today’s value they’d be worth more than $8.65 million.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 166 - CRYPTO AND STOCKS FALL
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Coinbase to make tokenised treasuries fund. Polymarket partners with Moonpay for on-ramp. Ferrari accepts crypto in Europe. Bitfarms stopped in poison-pill strategy. Riot buys another miner for $93m.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 165 - ETH ETFs TAKE IN 107M
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$78m, ETH ETFs: +$107m. BTC falls amid ETF outflows & Mt. Gox movements. ETH ETFs see ‘very solid’ first day $107m inflows. Grayscale ETH trust sees $484m outflow. ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Harris could be far more open to Bitcoin: Cuban. BTC symbol lights up Vegas Sphere. Coinbase continues to pursue Gensler emails. dYdX explores sale of derivatives tech. dYdX site recovers after DNS attack. JD to create Hong Kong stablecoin. Bitwise uses ENS addresses for ETH ETFs. BlackRock applies for ENA cash allocation. Uber CEO wants to accept BTC.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 164 - ETH ETF DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$534m. ETH outperforms slightly as 9 ETFs set to launch. Grayscale moves $1bn ETH to Coinbase for outflows. Biggest BlackRock ETF inflow day in 4 months. Mt Gox moves $2.8bn BTC for distributions. US government moves $4m BTC to Coinbase. Bedford FC buys $4.5m BTC. Hamilton Lane launches private credit fund on SOL. CNBC discusses BTC reserve currency rumour. Polymarket sets another trading record. BlockFi administrator submits plan to repay customers. WLD denies insider trading and manipulation claims. India keeps high crypto taxes unchanged. Gate exchange exits Japan. Marathon Digital fined $138m for breaching NDA. HyperLend launches lending on HyperLiquid.

entry.title: Mika Shares How to Sell Crypto Using Kraken Wallet
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Mika guides you through the process of selling crypto and transferring it back to your bank account.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 163 - JOEVER FOR BYEDEN
entry.summary: Crypto dips then bounces on Biden-Harris switch. SOL again leads, DEX volume eclipses ETH + BNB. Biden news had led to $67m liquidations. Democrats have chance to ‘regain crypto vote’. Mt Gox transfers to Bitstamp expected soon. Crypto sees $3.2bn fund inflows in 3 weeks. China company Boyaa buys $100m BTC. Polymarket saw $80m bets on Biden withdrawal. Polymarket 2024 volumes hit $500m. Elon appearance at Bitcoin Nashville rumoured. Combined SOL, BTC & ETH ETF coming: Geraci. Call skew heads to 2024 extremes in bullish sign. Plan B points to bullish setup in S2F model. Coinbase premium moves back to positive. Gensler likely resigns next year: 10x. Germany already lost $124m profit selling.
